scripts.build:ui:azdev-workitems: rimraf dist/azdev-workitems && mkdirp -p ui_dist/azdev-workitems && npm run build --prefix app/azdev-workitems && cp -r app/azdev-workitems/dist/* ui_dist/azdev-workitems

scripts.build:ui:users: rimraf dist/users && mkdirp -p ui_dist/users && npm run build --prefix app/users && cp -r app/users/dist/* ui_dist/users

scripts.build:ui:workitems-display: rimraf dist/workitems-display && mkdirp -p ui_dist/workitems-display && npm run build --prefix app/workitems-display && cp -r app/workitems-display/dist/* ui_dist/workitems-display
